title: A note on Hilbert 16th Problem
abstract:
Let $\mathcal{H}(n)$ be the maximum number of limit cycles that a planar
polynomial vector field of degree $n$ can have. In this paper we prove that
$\mathcal{H}(n)$ is realizable by structurally stable vector fields with only
hyperbolic limit cycles and that it is a strictly increasing function whenever
it is finite.
